title: Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | SB 1.6.28 | 23-11-2021
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: ओम अज्ञान तिमिरान धस्य ज्ञानान जनिशलाकया चक्षुरुन मीलितं येना तस्मै श्री गुरवे नमः
नमा ओम विश्णु पादाया कृष्ण प्रेष्ठाय भूतले श्रीमते भक्ति वेदान्त स्वामिन्निति नामिने
नमस्ते सारस्वते देवे गौरवाणी प्रचारिने निर्विशेश शुन्यवादी पाश्चात्य देशतारिने
जय श्री कृष्ण चैतन्या प्रभू नित्यानन्दा ख्री अद्वैत गदाधरा श्रीवासादी गौरभक्त वृन्दा
हरे कृष्णा हरे कृष्णा कृष्ण कृष्णा हरे हरे हरे रामा हरे रामा रामा रामा हरे हरे
ओम नमो भगवते वासु देवाया नारायनम नमस्कृत्य नरम चैवनरोत्तमम देवीम सरस्वतीम भ्यासम ततो जयमुदी रयेत
प्रयुज्जमाने मैताम शुद्धाम भागवतीम तनुम आरब्ध कर्म निर्वाणो न्यपतत पांचभवतिकहा
प्रयुज्जमाने मैताम शुद्धाम भागवतीम तनुम आरब्ध कर्म निर्वाणो निर्वाणो
प्रयुज्जमाने मैताम शुद्धाम भागवतिकहा
प्रयुज्जमाने मैताम शुद्धाम भागवतिकहा
body is it it is described in this verse bifitting and associate of the

the same quality as Krishna as a supreme personality of Godhead Krishna has a
completely transcendental form even we in our original position we have a
completely spiritual form and Narad Muni he is ready for going back to Godhead
so he is awarded a transcendental body bifitting and associate of the supreme
personality of God and then what happened to the other body he says I
quit the earlier body I quit the body made of five material elements
of course everybody quits such a body but then the advantage is for Narad
Muni does all acquired fruiting results of work or karma stopped no more karma
no more reactions so that is the wonderful achievement of a devotee who
is perfected his devotional service
In the purport, Shrila Prabhupada says in informed by the personality of Godhead that he
would be awarded a transcendental body bifitting the Lord's Association Narada
got his spiritual body as soon as he quit his material body immediately
actually our original form is not real itself butday's body as it is said also in the bible
as soon as he quit this material body immediately actually our original form
is a spiritual form
what is the meaning
of being awarded
it means that
our spiritual form
is in

that is our
real identity
अहम ब्रह्मास्मी
I am spirit soul
spirit soul means spiritual form
but it is
undeveloped in our
present condition because we are covered by a material body due to our desire to
enjoy materially so that spiritual form is undeveloped by spiritual practice by
devotional service the spiritual body develops exactly as we go on performing
pure devotional service we go on purifying our material contamination that
spiritual body develops we are awakened to spiritual reality as we go on
doing pure devotional service and proportion in proportion to our
awakening we are engaged more and more and more in pure devotional service this
is only by the mercy of the spiritual master and Krishna guru krishna by their
mercy only it's possible
and
time of death for a devotee there is no fear there is no uncertainty there is
no anxiety there are no reactions because the devotee is guaranteed to
change his body from material body to spiritual form
now proper further explains this transit body is free
from material affinity it has got no material attraction just like in this
body you always feel some material attraction for material sense objects
the senses body mean senses so These material senses are always attracted to
some material sense object eyes are looking for beautiful form but it is very Klarboar instrument as well.
This Transient ward secure character is
beautiful form ears are searching for melodious music or some words of praise
honor nose is looking for nice fragrance or nice aromas like that but a
transcendental body is free from material affinity no material attraction no
material attraction at all so all the senses of the transcendental form are
not disturbed are never attracted to anything material total freedom from all
material attractions that is the biggest problem in this material world for those
who want to control their senses that senses don't easily come under the
control
to avoid sense gratification is very difficult because very naturally it
seems like the senses are always attracted to the sense objects but when
we get a transcendental body it is no longer so and it is further said here
this transcendental body is invested with three primary transcendental
qualities there are three primary transcendental quality what are they
eternity that means this form is an eternal form unlike this material form
which is never eternal it is therefore a fixed duration that's all and even
during that limited duration of time this body undergoes changes they he knows
me nathoday hey kahumaram Yoganam Jara it goes through stages of change through changes through changes.
it goes through stages of change.
and youth and old age and old age is a fundamental misery that we have to
suffer invalidity due to old age so a transcendental body is eternal means
there is no material deterioration there is no material destruction and freedom
from material modes not only is this body temporary what we have but it is
also influenced by the gunas raja guna sattva guna tamo guna the three
influences will always be there sometimes sattva guna dominates
sometimes raja guna dominates sometimes tamo guna dominates accordingly our
behavior also changes so this is material existence it's horrible
we don't have the freedom to act properly when we are under the
influence of the three gunas but my devotional service we can rise above the
gunas gradually as we go on doing devotional service and devotional
service leads to our freedom completely from the three gunas.
material mode, we come to the spiritual platform, being freed from all the three modes,
three modes means the influence of the three modes, and the third characteristic of the transcendental
bodies, freedom from reactions of fruitive activities, always this body is a store of previous
fruitive activities, their reactions, these reactions keep on unfolding as Kala acts on this
body, by the action of time, the reactions are unfolding, sometimes good, sometimes not so good,
so both happiness and distress, Dvandva, Sukha Dukha, this we have to experience, but a transcendental
body,
has no reactions at all, no reactions, such a wonderful state of existence, this is what Krishna is
inviting us, come back to me means, come back to the spiritual life of eternity, bliss and knowledge,
the material body is always afflicted
with a lack of these three qualities material body is not eternal material body is not free from
material influence of the gunas material body is not free from reactions always these three things are there
a devotee's body becomes at once surcharged with transcendental qualities as soon as he is
engaged in the devotional service of the lord this is a wonderful thing about devotional service pure
devotional service as soon as we engage we become surcharged with transcendental qualities
immediately immediately you don't have to wait
for some advancement in krishna consciousness you don't have to wait immediately
the body becomes surcharged with transcendental qualities that's how we are able to do devotional
service and prabhupada gives an example here it acts like the
magnetic influence of a touchstone upon iron
when there is iron
a magnetic stone or a magnet it will immediately
influence that magnetic influence on iron will always be there in the presence of a touchstone
or a magnetic stone similarly when we do devotional service
the effect on this material body is that the material body will not
be an obstacle for our krishna consciousness
that's why devotional service is described
ahaituki apratihata
this is the nature of pure devotional service
therefore change of body means stoppage of the reaction of the three qualitative modes of material body
nature upon the pure devotee
no more influence and there are many instances of this in the revealed scripture druva maharaj and
pralad maharaj and many other devotees were able to see the personality of god face to face apparently
in the same body this means how could they see with these eyes we cannot see it spiritual form
transcendental form how were they able to see this means that the quality of a devotee's body
changes from material to spiritual as soon as he engages in devotional service changes
so only the devotees free from influence of the reactions influence of the three gunas
because of the causeless mercy of the supreme lord upon the devotee
